lines.text: Well, I'd certainly say she had marvelous judgment, Albert, if not particularly good taste.
Hell! They didn't have to cut her! She could have been used two or three more times!
Ah, war is hell.
Now let's run through the modern Presidents.
What good's all this history crap gonna do me?
Just do the Presidents.
Oh, God! Eisenhower, Truman...
TRUMAN, Eisenhower!
Truman, Eisenhower, Kennedy, Johnson, Nixon, Ford, Kennedy, Kennedy, Kennedy...
I hope the next time you play with yourself, you go blind.
Pull up your pants, Romeo.
A cautous young fellow named Lodge / Had seatbelts installed in his Dodge. / When his date was strapped in / He committed a sin / Without even leaving the garage. That's clever, isn't it?

[to sentry]
If my gun picks up one rust spot you're gonna wake up with a crowd around 'ya.
Lack of respect, wrong attitude, failure to obey authority.
You know, Albert, sometimes you can be such a putz...
A putz? What's a putz? It's somethin' bad, isn't it? You better take that back or I'm gonna kick your fuzzy butt!

[sighs]
Yep, definitely a putz.
Let's get another Michael out of the warehouse. This time make sure the engineering department wipes that smile off his face.
When we put this in, then we'll add that.
Breeding is an ugly thing.
